name: com.oramavr.mages.core
description: MAGES™ SDK is a powerful asset that lets you create immersive XR simulations like never before. Whether you’re a seasoned developer or a newcomer, unlock the full potential of virtual medical training. Elevate your simulations, amplify engagement, and redefine the future of medical education with MAGES SDK.

samples.description: An empty pre-configured scene to make starting a new project with the MAGES NXT SDK as fast as possible.
A simple room showcasing most important features of the MAGES NXT SDK.
